generated_text:
- road: The paved surface in the foreground and extending into the distance, where the Mercedes-Benz emblem is visible, is a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the street, where pedestrians are walking, is a sidewalk.
- building: The structures on both sides of the street, with windows and architectural features, are buildings.
- wall: The solid, vertical surface on the right side of the street, adjacent to the sidewalk, is a wall.
- pole: The vertical post holding a traffic sign on the right side of the street is a pole.
- traffic sign: The rectangular sign mounted on the pole on the right side of the street is a traffic sign.
- vegetation: The green foliage visible on the upper left side of the image, near the building, is vegetation.
- sky: The clear, blue area visible above the buildings in the background is the sky.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the street.
- car: The Mercedes-Benz emblem on the hood of the vehicle in the foreground indicates the presence of a car.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the distance, parked or moving on the street.
